chunk: Directions: [How to use] After cleansing or shaving, gently apply to face. This convenient all-in-one product works to tone, condition and moisturize skin.
book: 0019-Whamisa Organic Leaf Root All In One Moisturizer For Men

chunk: Warnings: [Precautions] Stop use if product causes irritation. If symptoms continue, seek medical advice. Do not use on wounds. Keep out of direct sunlight and extreme temperatures. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.
